1.content:
There are many types of Dragon-Fiends . First are the six basic each representing an element: Fire, Earth, Wind, Water, Light, and Darkness. Then there and the Dragon-Fiends of Legend. They are The Guardian, Destruction, Thunder, Supreme, True, Life, Final, First, Hope, Despair, Time, Space, and Death. Also let it be known that the path you chose will determine dome of your abilities. ( The path being Good or Bad.)
         If you make a character leave an option open so someone else can make one.

         Also make a short Bio of your character including their Name Physical Description and Personality.
1.title: Chose your type of Dragon-Fiend

11.content:
Name: Avner

         Sex: Male

         Age: 23

         Height: 5'4"

         Weight: 163

         Not too muscular.

         Personalty 1: Friendly most of the time. He can have short or long temper depending on the situation. Cares for his friends a lot. Doesn't get serious often.

         Demonic Personality: Always angry. Likes to destroy things.

         Bio: Once human that could see another emotions, personality, and true intentions. He watched as his parents was torn to pieces by a demon. He later stumbled through a hole in time to the Medieval times. Later became a Wanderer. Then met a prophet who told him of an envoy of the End was coming to wipe out all life, and the only way to stop it was by collecting six elemental swords. He later met two others who would join him on his journey. At the end of the journey he was the only one to survive. Later on he met a water dragon by the name of Draco. Draco hated humans for humans killed her mother. He later was able to befriend her by trying to protect her from an amarok. Soon after he was turned into a Dragon-Fiend after a fatal encounter with the demon who killed his parents (by injection of demon blood), and was brought back to life by one of the three gods. Has another personality if his demon side is in control. He is a bit different from other Dragon-Fiends.
11.title: Avner

info.brief_description: Make a Dragon-Fiend and go on and adventure
info.description:
Become a Dragon-Fiend a half human half dragon being. They can change their form to a dragon, a human, and anywhere in between.

The Rules
         - At least one Pargraph.
         - At least two options.
         - No killing of the main character.
         - Have fun and remeber anything can happen.
